name: Crate Ship Loader
description:
A small game I made for GBJAM 5. The restriction of the jam was to use only 4 colors and at Gameboy resolution. You control a forklift and your mission is to load the item crates onto the ship with a limited number of pickups and moves. This is one of the few games were I also did the sfx and music as well as the programming and art, so don't expect wonders! But I think it's a charming little thing, at the very least. :)

Controls:

  • Spacebar = Action button
  • Backspace = Back button
  • Arrow keys = D-pad

Palette swap cheat codes:

On the Nintendo intro screen, hold space and use the arrow keys to swap between 4 different color palettes!
